divs: sighting detailsas i have sent you photo's before,i am crying out for help.i'm not a crazy or trying to play with anyone.my hoppy is captureing image's out of our clouds\skys.while i have been captureing image's,i have also discovered ufo's.as the image's are getting stronger,i have captured ufo's also.i will send one photo of the ufo and an image i believe isn't just an image.i need to show an expert my stuff,then you will understand why i am trying to warn all.i do not know if we are in danger or what is going on.i do know one thing,something magical is going on in our skys.please do not disrecard what i am saying.i not only have captured objects in our clouds\skys,i have also discovered the unamagenable.these image's create magic.some of the ufo's i keep captureing spit out these circle shaped objects that spit out image's i have captured.you must see to believe.as i try to find the words to discripe my theory,i most find somebody out there that will listen.as i do show a few friends,family and co-workers,i also tell a few of them what i see,what i have visioned,what as happened to me since may 5th, 2010.i have actually told a few people about earthquake storms i have visioned on the west coast about 4 months ago.i do know there are ufo's,i have photo proof.in the (wolverton(ufo) photo,i see the silver ufo by the light,then there is an object above it(top of photo)then in the 0316111242[1],i see the cigar shape(under the light)then 0317111233j[1](right side of photo)i see a side view of a mans face looking toward the light,while there is other image's in this photo also.you should see what happens,unamagenable
